title: Selected awesome tourist destinations in Nusa Penida and Nusa Lembongan
desc:
With 14 villages, Nusa Penida has dozen places that may attract tourist. Cherysa Tour select tourist destionation to fit your time and budget.
We devide our tour into:
West Nusa Penida Tour: Tree of Love and Kelingking Beach, Angel Billabong, Crystal Bay Beach.
East Nusa Penida Tour: Teletubbies Hills, Raja Lima and Tree House, Atuh Beach and Giri Putri Cave.
Nusa Lembongan Tour: Panorama Point, Dream Beach, Devil's Tears, Yellow Bridge, Mangrove Forest.

tilesGrid.name: Angel Billabong
tilesGrid.desc: a spectacular rock formation on Nusa Penida island's southwestern cliff edges. It's nearby Pasih Uug (Broken Beach), another popular site with unique limestone formations. The naturally formed rock lagoon offers a scenic seascape. You can descend into its crystal-clear rock pools for a swim or a soak

tilesGrid.name: Broken Beach
tilesGrid.desc: Broken Beach also popular as Pasih Uug is a scenic coastal formation on the southwestern edge of Nusa Penida island. The spot is marked by a hilly arch-like rock formation, which is the distinguishable landmark of the area. Set over the crashing waves of the open Indian Ocean.

tilesGrid.name: Kelingking Beach
tilesGrid.desc: Kelingking Beach is a hidden beach in the village of Bunga Mekar, on the southwestern coast of Nusa Penida island. You can enjoy one of the most breath-taking views over the hills and small strip of white sand from atop a hill of the same name. This unique formation is reminiscent of a Tyrannosaurus Rex head, hence its nickname ‘T-Rex Bay’.
